column5: Having just moved to Barrie, as some of you may know, I was out scouting the area this morning with my new Lowrance Iway - and found a Hunting and Angling club on Old South Road 2 - does anyone have a contact there, a web site or some info? -  Also - to all of you that directed me to the Wolfs Den for my Hunting and Gun course - thank you - taking this in March.  Thanks all - and.... all the best in '07 to you all - maybe this year I will get my boat "Bare Essential" out on the water!!!
Hello Bare...I live up in the Nipissing area so Im not sure of the clubs in that area. I do know that Elwood Epps hunting and fishing store in Orillia may be able to give you some info on that.
If you're in contact with Wolf's Den, they should have some info for you.  Good luck.

Welcome aboard   This may help you get started  Barrie District Anglers & Hunters Conservation Club Barrie Bruce (705) 722-3049  Here is another source in Barrie  http://www.barriegunclub.org/  Good luck  John
